io_context::poll_one

Run the io_context object's event processing loop to execute one ready handler. 

count_type poll_one();
  » more...

(Deprecated: Use non-error_code overload.) Run the io_context object's event processing loop to execute one ready handler. 

count_type poll_one(
    asio::error_code & ec);
